name: Accubid Anywhere Testing
description: Accubid is a comprehensive estimating and project management software designed for electrical contractors. It helps streamline the bidding, project tracking, and cost management processes, improving accuracy and efficiency in construction projects.

connectionDefinitions.name: Accubid OAuth2
connectionDefinitions.description: OAuth2 authentication for Accubid Anywhere APIs

attributes.title: Connection Environment
attributes.description: Select the Accubid environment to connect to

configSchema.title: Database V1 Action Processor Configuration
configSchema.description: Configuration of the data object actions for the module.

configSchema.title: Database V1 Cache Writer Configuration
configSchema.description: Configuration of the data object caches for the module.

dataObjects.name: Databases
dataObjects.description: Represents a database in Accubid Anywhere that the user has access to.

token.description: Token for accessing the database. This token does not change and can be saved for future use.

schema.description: Represents a database in Accubid Anywhere that the user has access to.

configSchema.title: Estimate V1 Action Processor Configuration
configSchema.description: Configuration of the data object actions for the module.

configSchema.title: Estimate V1 Cache Writer Configuration
configSchema.description: Configuration of the data object caches for the module.

dataObjects.name: Estimate
dataObjects.description: Represents a detailed estimate from Accubid Anywhere

projectId.description: ID of the project this estimate belongs to

lastModifiedDate.description: Date the estimate was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: User who last modified the estimate

laborColumn.description: The labor column used in the estimate

laborFactorMethod.description: The labor factor method used in the estimate

applyMarkupOnOverhead.description: Setting to indicate if ApplyMarkupOnOverhead is used in the estimate

vendorPricingPrecedence.description: Setting to indicate if VendorPricingPrecedence is used in the estimate

contract.description: Name of the contract related to the estimate

isDeleted.description: Flag to indicate if the estimate has been marked as deleted

items.description: List of bid summaries related to the estimate

bidSummaries.description: List of bid summaries related to the estimate

items.description: List of breakdown categories related to the estimate

breakdownCategories.description: List of breakdown categories related to the estimate

schema.description: Represents a detailed estimate from Accubid Anywhere

dataObjects.name: Estimates
dataObjects.description: Represents an estimate from the system

projectId.description: The project ID this estimate belongs to

estimateId.description: Estimate id. This ID can be used with the estimate api to get information for the estimate.

createdBy.description: Name of the person who created the estimate

contract.description: Name of contract related to the estimate

isDeleted.description: Flag to indicate the estimate has been deleted

schema.description: Represents an estimate from the system

dataObjects.name: Estimates By Due Date
dataObjects.description: Represents an estimate with due date information

startDate.description: Start date of the date range

endDate.description: End date of the date range

schema.description: Represents an estimate with due date information

dataObjects.name: Extension Item Details File Signal R

id.description: Example primary key of the object

fileUrl.description: URL to download the extension item details file

dataObjects.name: SignalR Notification Test
dataObjects.description: Represents a SignalR notification test response

fileUrl.description: URL to download the extension item details file

schema.title: SignalR Notification Test
schema.description: Represents a SignalR notification test response

managingBranchName.description: Name of managing branch for the project

dataObjects.name: Project
dataObjects.description: Represents a project from Accubid Anywhere

createdBy.description: Name of person who created the project

managingBranchName.description: Name of managing branch for the project

sitePhone.description: Phone number for the project's site

siteFax.description: Fax number for the project's site

siteZipCode.description: Zip/Postal Code for the project's site

supplierExchange.description: Supplier Exchange id for the vendor

items.description: List of vendors related to the project

vendors.description: List of vendors related to the project

schema.description: Represents a project from Accubid Anywhere

dataObjects.description: Represents a project summary from Accubid Anywhere

dataObjects.name: Final Price
dataObjects.description: Represents a final price record from Accubid Anywhere

id.description: Unique identifier for the final price record

calculatedPercentage.description: Calculated percentage for the final price

calculatedAmount.description: Calculated amount for the final price

basedOn.description: Base reference for the final price

fieldLaborIncluded.description: Indicates if field labor is included

shopLaborIncluded.description: Indicates if shop labor is included

incidentalLaborIncluded.description: Indicates if incidental labor is included

laborFactoringIncluded.description: Indicates if labor factoring is included

indirectLaborIncluded.description: Indicates if indirect labor is included

schema.description: Represents a final price record from Accubid Anywhere

dataObjects.name: Contract Cost Distribution
dataObjects.description: Represents a cost distribution for a contract in Accubid Anywhere

id.description: Unique identifier for the cost distribution

bidSummaryID.description: ID of the associated bid summary

bidSummaryName.description: Name of the associated bid summary

vendor.description: Vendor associated with the cost distribution

schema.description: Represents a cost distribution for a contract in Accubid Anywhere

index.description: The index of the quote label

description.description: The description of the quote label

dataObjects.name: Contracts
dataObjects.description: Represents a contract in Accubid Anywhere

contractID.description: Contract ID number for the estimate

items.description: List of estimates associated with the contract

estimates.description: List of estimates associated with the contract

schema.description: Represents a contract in Accubid Anywhere

dataObjects.name: Contract Statuses
dataObjects.description: Represents a status for a contract in Accubid Anywhere

id.description: Unique identifier for the contract status

IncludeInCOToDate.description: Whether to include in CO to date

dataObjects.name: Contract Subcontract Labels

enumVName.description: Enum value name of the subcontract label
